aboutDescription: Repeatedly trying to guess meaning of a word is a very effective method to learn-by-heart new vocabulary.
aboutDescription2: With this app, you can learn new Finnish words anytime, anywhere, while sitting on the bus or waiting for your lunch.
aboutDescription3: Send feedback / request or report bugs / grammar issues to email:
step1: A random Finnish word is displayed.
step2: Take a few seconds to guess the meaning.
step3: Click the "Show" button to see the correct answer and more details.
step4: Use the "Previous" and "Next" buttons to navigate through the words.
step5: Click the "New Set" button to start a new set of words.
